strings.SS2_DRONE_SHOCK_PICKUP: <style=cIsUtility>Shocks</style> nearby enemies, interrupting and stunning them.
strings.SS2_DRONE_SHOCK_DESCRIPTION: A companion bought with gold that will follow the survivor at a close distance, <stlye=cIsUtility>shocking</style> enemies, interrupting and stunning them.
strings.SS2_DRONE_SHOCK_SKILL_DESCRIPTION: Fires an electric blast, dealing <style=cIsDamage>100% damage</style> in an area and <style=cIsUtility>shocking</style> enemies for <style=cIsUtility>5 seconds</style>.
strings.SS2_DRONE_CLONE_DESCRIPTION: A companion bought with gold that will follow the survivor at a close distance. <style=cIsUtility>Duplicates</style> nearby item pickups.
strings.SS2_DRONE_CLONE_SKILL_DESCRIPTION: Channels on a nearby item. Upon completion, creates a <style=cIsUtility>duplicate</style> of the item.
